sprykerComponent.name: quantity-input
sprykerComponent.readme: Displays product quantity field with a label and, optionally, the update button for this field.

defines.name: data
defines.contract:
label: 'cart.item_quantity' | trans,
    maxQuantity: null,
    minQuantity: 1,
    value: 1,
    readOnly: false,
    hasUpdateButton: true
